scripts.test: mocha --reporter spec --bail --ui bdd --colors --timeout 10000 --compilers coffee:coffee-script --require coffee-script --require test/helpers.coffee --globals 'html, head, body, p, ul, li, a, table, thead, tr, th, tbody, td, link, br, hr, title, abbr, acronym, address, applet, article, aside, audio, b, bdo, big, blockquote, button, canvas, caption, center, cite, code, colgroup, command, datalist, dd, del, details, dfn, dir, div, dl, dt, em, embed, fieldset, figcaption, figure, font, footer, form, frameset, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, header, hgroup, i, iframe, ins, keygen, kbd, label, legend, map, mark, menu, meter, nav, noframes, noscript, object, ol, optgroup, option, output, pre, progress, q, rp, rt, ruby, s, samp, script, section, select, small, source, span, strike, strong, style, sub, summary, sup, textarea, tfoot, time, tt, u, area, base, basefont, col, frame, img, input, meta, param' test/test.coffee
